metadata.title: Brave Creators
metadata.description: Sign up with Brave Creators to begin receiving contributions from your fans and supporters. Register your website or social media accounts now to begin receiving payouts and contributions. Earn more with Brave Creators.

shared.app_description: Do you run a website or channels on YouTube or Twitch? If you’re interested in monetizing your content, verify your site and unlock your contributions!
shared.channel_created: Channel created. Your verified status will be displayed in the Brave browser within the next 24-48 hours.
shared.channel_contested: Channel will be transferred from current owner in %{time_until_transfer}.
shared.channel_could_not_be_contested: Channel could not be contested. If you think this is in error, please contact us at https://community.brave.com/
shared.channel_contested_by: Channel has been verified by another publisher and will be transferred to their account in %{time_until_transfer} unless you reject.
shared.channel_quota_exceeded: We're so popular we exceeded our daily quota of YouTube registrations. Please try again tomorrow.
shared.error: Oh no! Something went wrong, please contact support.
shared.support_note_html: If you have any questions, please contact the Brave Creators team at https://community.brave.com/
shared.warning_note_html:
This email contains a private access link. Anyone with access to it can gain access to your private publisher information. Ensure you trust the recipient before forwarding or sharing this email.

If you have any questions, please contact the Brave Creators team at https://community.brave.com/

shared.errors: There were errors saving your request:

uphold_connection.send_emails: Receive emails notifying me if I can't receive payments.

publisher.marketing_emails: By checking here, I consent to be informed of new features and promotions via email.
publisher.name: Your Name

NavDropdown.crypto_contributions_text: Connect your favorite Ethereum and Solana wallets for each of your channels and receive contributions from your fans

account.connect_prompt: Connect an account to receive BAT contributions and monthly payouts. Select your country to see a list of available account providers.
account.country_disclaimer: You won’t be eligible for monthly payouts until you connect a custodial account.
account.wrong_region: {provider} accounts registered in {region}  are not supported at this time. However, you can connect anyway, and you'll become eligible if {region} is supported in the future.

channels.add_channel_prompt: Let's start with choosing where you're publishing your content:
channels.website_prompt: I have my own website and have access to the domain directory.
channels.youtube_prompt: I own or manage a YouTube channel.
channels.twitch_prompt: I'm the primary owner of a Twitch channel.
channels.x_prompt: I own or manage an X account.
channels.vimeo_prompt: I own or manage a Vimeo channel.
channels.add_channel_prompt: Channels are accounts, sites or other properties on the Web that you own, like a YouTube channel, a Reddit account, your own website, etc.

addCryptoWidget.solanaConnectError: Connect a Solana wallet to add an address
addCryptoWidget.ethereumConnectError: Connect an Ethereum wallet to add an address
addCryptoWidget.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
addCryptoWidget.privacyNotification: Using the same crypto address for multiple channels will allow others to know that those channels all belong to you. If you don't want others to know, use a different crypto address for each of your channels.
addCryptoWidget.privacyContinue: I understand and would like to continue

delete_account.heading: Account Deletion
delete_account.intro: Your Brave Creators account and information will be permanently deleted from our database. This action cannot be undone.

prompt.final_confirmation: It'll take a few minutes for the purge to complete.
prompt.header: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
prompt.warning: Your Brave Creators account and information will be permanently deleted from our database. This action cannot be undone.

delete_account.warning: Your channels and all accounts related information will be permanently deleted from our database as well as from connected providers. This cannot be undone.

email.heading: Email Settings
email.marketing_label: Updates on new features and promotions

extended_login.intro: Keep my login active for 30 days

index.heading: Two-factor Authentication
index.intro: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is a method of confirming your identity by using two different forms of verification when you access Brave Payments in order to increase security (recommended for protecting your account).

confirm_disable.final_confirmation: Are you sure you want to disable authenticator app?
confirm_disable.no_2fa_warning_html: Disabling authenticator app will effectively turn off the two-factor authentication for your account.
confirm_disable.no_totp_warning: Authenticator app provides a good fallback method to log in to your account securely in the case that you lose the hardware security key.

totp.disabled: Authenticator app has not been set up
totp.disabled_without_fallback_html: Recommended: Set up an authenticator as the secondary 2FA in case you run into a problem with the security key.
totp.enabled: Authenticator app has been set up
totp.heading: App on your phone
totp.intro: Use an app on your phone to get an authentication code. You will be asked to type in this code when logging in.

browser.content_html: This means you will need to update to the latest Brave, Google Chrome or Opera in order to set up and log in using security keys. More browsers will start supporting the security key in the near future. We will inform you on the changes.
browser.heading: Limited Browser Support

device.content_html:
The following products have been tested and proven to work with our system:
- YubiKey
- Ledger Blue
device.heading: Tested Security Keys
device.tooltip: A list of security keys that have been tested

u2f.heading: Hardware security keys
u2f.intro: Security key is a small device that connects to your computer via a USB port and works with FIDO Universal 2nd Factor (U2F). You will be asked to insert and press the key instead of typing in a code.
u2f.intro_warning: Currently, security key is supported by Brave, Google Chrome, and Opera.

prompt.heading: Protect your account
prompt.intro: This added security is recommended for making sure it's really you logging in to your account.

confirm_disable.no_totp_warning:
Authenticator app provides a good fallback method to log
in to your account securely in the case that you lose the
hardware security key.
confirm_disable.no_2fa_warning_html: Disabling authenticator app will effectively turn off the two-factor authentication for your account.
confirm_disable.final_confirmation: Are you sure you want to disable authenticator app?

new.heading: Set Up Authenticator App
new.step_1: Install an authenticator app on your mobile phone.
new.step_2: Scan the QR code below with your app.
new.step_2_alt: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this code:
new.step_3: Enter the 6-digit code from the app once the scan is complete.
new.warning: Reconfiguring will invalidate your existing authentication code devices.

new.heading: Register Security Key
new.name_placeholder: Enter a nickname for the key

u2f-error.bad-request:
There was an unexpected error in the registration request made by
Brave. Please reload this page and re-attempt registration.
(BAD_REQUEST)
u2f-error.device-ineligible:
The presented security key is not eligible for registration. This may mean
that the token is already registered. (DEVICE_INELIGIBLE)
u2f-error.implementation-incomplete:
Please insert your security key and re-attempt registration. Some
browsers have an incomplete implementation of this
protocol. Please use a current release of Brave, Google Chrome or Opera.
(IMPLEMENTATION_INCOMPLETE)
u2f-error.other-error:
There was an unexpected error registering your security key. Re-attempting
registration may resolve this issue. (OTHER_ERROR)
u2f-error.timeout:
There was an unexpected timeout waiting for your security key to respond to
the registration request. Please re-attempt registration and activate
the security key when it is blinking. (TIMEOUT)

new.u2f-unavailable:
Your browser doesn't look like it supports U2F, the two factor auth
platform supported by Brave. Please use the latest version of Brave, Chrome
or Opera to register your U2F-compatible device, for example a YubiKey.
new.waiting_description: Insert the new hardware key into your computer and press the button when it's blinking.

confirm_disable.final_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this security key?
confirm_disable.no_2fa_warning_html:
Removing this security key will effectively
turn off the two-factor authentication
for your account.

contribution_pages.add_account_msg: Add a {social} account to enable this field
contribution_pages.social_link_note: Note: Social networks shown in this section are channels you’ve registered with Brave Creators.

bitflyer.notPayable: To receive your payments, you'll need to verify your identity on bitFlyer.
bitflyer.title: bitFlyer Account

brave.description: Connect a custodial account to receive BAT contributions and payouts.
brave.nonKycWarning: Connect a custodial account to become a verified creator, and to begin receiving monthly payouts. You won’t be eligible for payouts until you connect a custodial account. Learn more.
brave.paymentFailedWarning: We found an issue with the connection to your {custodian} account. Please check if there are any issues with your {custodian} account, and try connecting again.
brave.title: Account for BAT Payment

currencies.description: You will receive monthly contributions from your Brave fans in this currency in your account.
currencies.fees: For currency choices other than BAT, This exchange will charge an exchange fee upon deposit. Check fees.
currencies.title: Confirm your preferred deposit currency or token

gemini.notPayable: To receive your payments, you'll need to verify your identity on Gemini.
gemini.reauthorizationNeeded: Gemini is reporting to us that your account connection is out of date. This could be the result of changing your Gemini password or other changes on your Gemini account. Please try disconnecting and reconnecting your Gemini account.
gemini.blocked_country: It looks like you’re in an unsupported country for Brave Creators with Gemini, so your channels won’t appear as verified. However, once your country is supported, you’ll automatically become verified and be eligible to receive payouts to your Gemini account. <blocked_country_link>Learn more</blocked_country_link>.
gemini.title: Gemini Account
gemini.duplicateAccount: It looks like your Gemini account is already connected to another Brave Creators account. Please disconnect your Gemini account from any other Brave Creators accounts, and then try again.

disconnectModal.title: Confirm Disconnection
disconnectModal.text: Are you sure you would like to disconnect your {provider} account from your Brave Creators account? Your sites and channels will no longer be able to receive contributions through {provider}.
disconnectModal.textLine2: You will be able to connect an account again after disconnecting.

currency.fee_disclaimer: Please note, for currency choices other than BAT, Uphold will charge an exchange fee upon deposit. Check fees
currency.headline: Confirm your preferred deposit currency or token
currency.intro: You will receive monthly contributions from your Brave fans in this currency in your Uphold account.

uphold.description: Connect to Uphold to be able to receive contributions and other payments in BAT.

disconnect.confirmation: Are you sure you want to disconnect your account with Uphold?
disconnect.headline: Disconnect Uphold Account?
disconnect.intro: You won't be able to receive the monthly contributions from your fans until your wallet at Uphold is connected to us.

status.connecting: Brave Creators is connecting to your Uphold account.
status.nonMember: To receive your payments, you'll need to verify your identity on Uphold.
status.reauthorizationNeeded: Uphold is reporting to us that your account connection is out of date. This could be the result of changing your Uphold password or other changes on your Uphold account. Please try disconnecting and reconnecting your Uphold account.
status.restrictedMember: Your transaction level is currently flagged by uphold. Please contact Uphold for assistance.
status.blocked_country: It looks like you’re in an unsupported country for Brave Creators with Uphold, so your channels won’t appear as verified. However, once your country is supported, you’ll automatically become verified and be eligible to receive payouts to your Uphold account. <blocked_country_link>Learn more</blocked_country_link>.

uphold.title: Uphold Account

addCryptoWidget.ethereumConnectError: Connect an Ethereum wallet to add an address

publicChannelPage.privacyDisclaimer: Please note that your contribution will be publicly visible as a transaction on the blockchain network you select, and cannot be deleted.
publicChannelPage.trustWarning: Make sure you trust this creator. Contributions made via this page go to
publicChannelPage.QRModalText: You can send by scanning this QR code using a Web3 wallet from your mobile device.
publicChannelPage.paymentHeading: Show your love and send a token of your gratitude
publicChannelPage.thanks: Thanks for supporting your favorite creators
publicChannelPage.successTweet: I just sent some {symbol} to {name} via their Brave contribution page {url}! Want to receive {symbol} too? Sign up at https://creators.brave.com!
publicChannelPage.QRBatText: Scanning this QR code will give you the creator’s BAT address on {chain}.
publicChannelPage.QRStandardText: Scanning this QR code will give you the creator’s {chain} address.
publicChannelPage.ErrorTitle: There was a problem sending your contribution
publicChannelPage.noEthMsg: Connect an Ethereum wallet to send your contribution
publicChannelPage.noSolMsg: Connect a Solana wallet to send your contribution
publicChannelPage.tryBraveText: It looks like you don't have an Ethereum or Solana wallet installed yet. You'll need one to create and manage your crypto addresses.
